description:
As the duel between Vetrix and Yuma races to its cataclysmic conclusion, Yuma stares down defeat and comes face-to-face with Vetrix’s shocking secret!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Senritsu no Duel! Tachiagare Kizuna no Eye Zexal
The Terrifying Duel! Arise, Hero of Bonds, ZEXAL!
戦慄のデュエル!立ち上がれ絆の英雄ゼアル
